title: Smoltreg workflow
text: assist quality assurance smolt data (used mark/recapture studies ) several R-packages available. vignette package Smoltreg gives overview whole process delivery raw data traps human readable report assesment smolt production river. Figure 1: Overview workflow smolt traps data collection Save data $restricted/Lax/Data/YYYY/Rådata/River/Smoltfälla Copy data files personal work folder Load Smoltreg Excel file Check data Fix errors Repeat clean Save Sötebasen file Mail Sötebasen file Ålderslabb (Malin) Use sote2bugs.R convert data $restricted/Sötebasen/Exporter/ input Use sote_import2bugs.R convert file send Ålderslabb input Start BlackBox (see also original documentation Atso Stefan1) Cut paste data Excel file produced smolts2bugs various .odc files. Run model save results (Described original documentation) Use https://slu-aqua-diadromous.github.io/SmoltReports/ produce report
code:
# Install our inhouse packages used remotes::install_github("SLU-Aqua-diadromous/Smoltreg", build_vignettes = TRUE) remotes::install_github("SLU-Aqua-diadromous/smolts2bugs", build_vignettes = TRUE) remotes::install_github("SLU-Aqua-diadromous/SmoltReports") flowchart TD   A[Archive received data on restricted/Lax/Data/YYYY/Rådata/River/... 
Register the data in restricted/Lax/Data/Loggbok_Datahantering_Lax.xlsx]   B[Make a private copy for quality check and prepatation for Sötebasen 
Check and fix the data when data is OK prepare a Sötebasen file. 
Tool to check data and format Sötebasen file at github.com/SLU-Aqua-diadromous/Smoltreg 
Mail Sötebasen-file to Ålderslabb]   C[When the data is imported in Sötebasen it will be available at: 
restricted/Sötebasen/Exporter/Smoltfälla*.csv]   D[Use package smolt2bugs to reformat Sötebasen export to an Blackbox/Excel-file
Cut and Paste result into Blackbox]   E[Create report using SmoltReports]   A --> B   B --> C   C --> D   D --> E

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: section describes parts 1 3 workflow detail. Data smolt traps delivered Excel-file predefined format. Usually file named Smoltreg_RIVER_YYYY_MM_DD.xlsx. file contain tabs: Fiskdata data individual catches. Metadata Basic data location active period trap. Metadata2 Data needed Sötebasen Dagbok (Optional) Daily logg information significant efents. Can also contain maually registered water temp water flow. Envlogger_water Data data logger (added SLU see ) Envlogger_land Data data logger (added SLU see ) addition two file temp/pressure loggers file extension .hobo. data must quality checked errors formatted format suitable importing info Sötebasen. formatted file sent Ålderslabb add additional data file sent Anders Kinnerbäck imported Sötebasen. data smolt traps exported Sötebasen \\storage-dh.slu.se\restricted$\Sötebasen\Exporter\Smoltfälla*.csv. .csv-files later used input estimation total smolt runs. Package Smoltreg contains routines shiny-app facilitate error checking finally format file ready sent ålderslab Make copies delivered data files smolt trap. find raw (delivered) data files central file server \\storage-dh.slu.se\restricted$\Lax\Data\YYYY\Rådata\RIVER (YYYY RIVER changed). least Excel file fishdata file temp-pressure logger. must compile one single Excel contains several tabs specific tabs fishdata, environmental data (temp water level) metadata. Open copy Excel file make initial check tab Fiskdata. tab Fiskdata list fish observations. quick scan data find obvious error. example check date format, prefered data format YY-MM-DD HH:MM. Obvious errors fixed try run data checking script. Switch tab Metadata check filled trap personel, otherwise fill (Dummy tag: optional). Create new tab named Metadata2. tab contains fields required Sötebasen-import. Needed fields : Metod, Beställare, Ansvarig, Syfte, Sekretess, Märkning Signatur. See example previous year example. Use HOBOware convert hobo data files excel-files. One file logger water one logger air. Make sure use SI-units (kPa °C), export data events. Add file tab file. Name tabs Envlogger_water Envlogger_land. app trim data include dates start stop date (defined tab Metadata), calculate water depth preassure calculate mean temp depth day. data loggers reason isn’t available can use data recorded maually downloaded net. Add sheet named Miljödata three columns date, w_level w_temp. Add values Miljödata sheet. One row per date period trap active. Smoltreg::smoltregApp() shiny-app facilitates quality assurance input file formatting output file format required Sötebasen. app automatically fix errors, example fix case species names. Start shiny app sanity checks Smoltreg-file command Smoltreg::smoltregApp(). Check file clicking various buttons top bottom. Often errors dependent start topmost test fix errors go. Everytime make changes reload file check evrything errors eliminated. Finally button “Save Sötebasen-file” can save file suitable import Sötebasen.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Make copies delivered data files smolt trap. find raw (delivered) data files central file server \\storage-dh.slu.se\restricted$\Lax\Data\YYYY\Rådata\RIVER (YYYY RIVER changed). least Excel file fishdata file temp-pressure logger. must compile one single Excel contains several tabs specific tabs fishdata, environmental data (temp water level) metadata. Open copy Excel file make initial check tab Fiskdata. tab Fiskdata list fish observations. quick scan data find obvious error. example check date format, prefered data format YY-MM-DD HH:MM. Obvious errors fixed try run data checking script. Switch tab Metadata check filled trap personel, otherwise fill (Dummy tag: optional). Create new tab named Metadata2. tab contains fields required Sötebasen-import. Needed fields : Metod, Beställare, Ansvarig, Syfte, Sekretess, Märkning Signatur. See example previous year example.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Use HOBOware convert hobo data files excel-files. One file logger water one logger air. Make sure use SI-units (kPa °C), export data events. Add file tab file. Name tabs Envlogger_water Envlogger_land. app trim data include dates start stop date (defined tab Metadata), calculate water depth preassure calculate mean temp depth day. data loggers reason isn’t available can use data recorded maually downloaded net. Add sheet named Miljödata three columns date, w_level w_temp. Add values Miljödata sheet. One row per date period trap active.

what: Alt 1. You have data from HOBO loggers.
title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Use HOBOware convert hobo data files excel-files. One file logger water one logger air. Make sure use SI-units (kPa °C), export data events. Add file tab file. Name tabs Envlogger_water Envlogger_land. app trim data include dates start stop date (defined tab Metadata), calculate water depth preassure calculate mean temp depth day.

what: Alt 2. You have manually measured temp and level
title: Smoltreg workflow
text: data loggers reason isn’t available can use data recorded maually downloaded net. Add sheet named Miljödata three columns date, w_level w_temp. Add values Miljödata sheet. One row per date period trap active.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Smoltreg::smoltregApp() shiny-app facilitates quality assurance input file formatting output file format required Sötebasen. app automatically fix errors, example fix case species names. Start shiny app sanity checks Smoltreg-file command Smoltreg::smoltregApp(). Check file clicking various buttons top bottom. Often errors dependent start topmost test fix errors go. Everytime make changes reload file check evrything errors eliminated. Finally button “Save Sötebasen-file” can save file suitable import Sötebasen.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Figure 2: Workflow qualitycheck incomming smolt data
code: flowchart TD     A[Smoltreg.xlsx] --> B(smoltregApp)     B --> C{All test OK}     C -->|No| D[Fix error] --> B     C -->|Yes| E[Save Sötebasen-file]     E --> F[Send to Ålderslabb]

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Open Samples... Inference menue BlackBox. Set chains 1 2, beg 5000, end 25 000 thin 20. extract 1000 samples chain total 2000 samples. First extract summary statistics variables setting node * click stats. Select data Node statistics window paste Excel. Column blank delete . Rename sheet stats save file model_results.xlsx SMOLTS_river_year/species folder. Change node CU click coda. Three windows open can close one called CODA index. Create new sheet model_results.xlsx spread sheet rename CU. Select everything window CODA chain 1, copy paste CU sheet (columns B). Repeat window CODA chain 2 copy columns C D. Remove (duplicated) column C. Insert row top set column names iteration, chain1 chain2. Repeat steps node sigma save Excel file. Create Word-file named gelman_rubin.docx SMOLTS_river_year/species folder cut paste two windows named Gelman Rubin statistic.

Register the data in restricted/Lax/Data/Loggbok_Datahantering_Lax.xlsx]   B[Make a private copy for quality check and prepatation for Sötebasen

Tool to check data and format Sötebasen file at github.com/SLU-Aqua-diadromous/Smoltreg

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Make copies delivered data files smolt trap. find raw (delivered) data files central file server \\storage-dh.slu.se\restricted$\Lax\Data\YYYY\Rådata\RIVER (YYYY RIVER changed). least Excel file fishdata file temp-pressure logger. must compile one single Excel contains several tabs specific tabs fishdata, environmental data (temp water level) metadata. Open copy Excel file make initial check tab Fiskdata. tab Fiskdata list fish observations. quick scan data find obvious error. example check date format, prefered data format YY-MM-DD HH:MM. Obvious errors fixed try run data checking script. Switch tab Metadata check filled trap personel, otherwise fill (Dummy tag: optional). Create new tab named Metadata2. tab contains fields required Sötebasen-import. Needed fields : Metod, Beställare, Ansvarig, Syfte, Sekretess, Märkning Signatur. See example previous year example.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Use HOBOware convert hobo data files excel-files. One file logger water one logger air. Make sure use SI-units (kPa °C), export data events. Add file tab file. Name tabs Envlogger_water Envlogger_land. app trim data include dates start stop date (defined tab Metadata), calculate water depth preassure calculate mean temp depth day. data loggers reason isn’t available can use data recorded maually downloaded net. Add sheet named Miljödata three columns date, w_level w_temp. Add values Miljödata sheet. One row per date period trap active.

what: Alt 1. You have data from HOBO loggers.
title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Use HOBOware convert hobo data files excel-files. One file logger water one logger air. Make sure use SI-units (kPa °C), export data events. Add file tab file. Name tabs Envlogger_water Envlogger_land. app trim data include dates start stop date (defined tab Metadata), calculate water depth preassure calculate mean temp depth day.

what: Alt 2. You have manually measured temp and level
title: Smoltreg workflow
text: data loggers reason isn’t available can use data recorded maually downloaded net. Add sheet named Miljödata three columns date, w_level w_temp. Add values Miljödata sheet. One row per date period trap active.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Smoltreg::smoltregApp() shiny-app facilitates quality assurance input file formatting output file format required Sötebasen. app automatically fix errors, example fix case species names. Start shiny app sanity checks Smoltreg-file command Smoltreg::smoltregApp(). Check file clicking various buttons top bottom. Often errors dependent start topmost test fix errors go. Everytime make changes reload file check evrything errors eliminated. Finally button “Save Sötebasen-file” can save file suitable import Sötebasen.

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Figure 2: Workflow qualitycheck incomming smolt data
code: flowchart TD     A[Smoltreg.xlsx] --> B(smoltregApp)     B --> C{All test OK}     C -->|No| D[Fix error] --> B     C -->|Yes| E[Save Sötebasen-file]     E --> F[Send to Ålderslabb]

title: Smoltreg workflow
text: Open Samples... Inference menue BlackBox. Set chains 1 2, beg 5000, end 25 000 thin 20. extract 1000 samples chain total 2000 samples. First extract summary statistics variables setting node * click stats. Select data Node statistics window paste Excel. Column blank delete . Rename sheet stats save file model_results.xlsx SMOLTS_river_year/species folder. Change node CU click coda. Three windows open can close one called CODA index. Create new sheet model_results.xlsx spread sheet rename CU. Select everything window CODA chain 1, copy paste CU sheet (columns B). Repeat window CODA chain 2 copy columns C D. Remove (duplicated) column C. Insert row top set column names iteration, chain1 chain2. Repeat steps node sigma save Excel file. Create Word-file named gelman_rubin.docx SMOLTS_river_year/species folder cut paste two windows named Gelman Rubin statistic.

what: Check data quality of data files delivered from smolt traps
title: Check data quality of data files delivered from smolt traps
text: Import smolt mark-recapture data Sötebasen. Scripts check data quality data files delivered smolt traps. Use Smoltreg::smoltregApp() detect error. detected errors scripts corrected data can formated files suitable import Sötebasen. See vignette (vignette("workflow", package = "Smoltreg")) https://slu-aqua-diadromous.github.io/Smoltreg/articles/workflow.html

what: Read sheet with fish data and do some basic cleanup. — read_fish
title: Read sheet with fish data and do some basic cleanup. — read_fish
text: Read excel-file Smoltreg-format basic cleanup data.frame returned. vector dummy_tags given tags matching removed. species name standardized capital first letter rest lowercase. Columns smoltstat genid uppercased. column date_time standarised POSIXct missing values imputed using "last observation carried forward" algorithm. Missing NA column event replaced UNKNOWN event code. Recaptured fish without species get species set MARKED event pit tag.
